stories.text:
We're an indie app that's trying to make it easier to make genuine new friends as an adult.

One month ago, Meta/FB restricted our app from using their Instagram API.

Reason? We failed to properly integrate a feature that we do not use at all! (FB Login)

We have appealed 7 times now, but all that happens is the appeal button becomed re-enabled after a few days and there is no response. Nothing. Zilch.

Has anyone managed to get through to an actual human? We have tens of thousands of users who are affected.

(For those who are curious, the app is https://www.we3app.com/)
